# StringExtensions.FirstCharToUpper method

Creates a new string in which the first character is uppercase.

```csharp
public static string FirstCharToUpper(this string input)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| input | The string to convert. |

## Return Value

The string with the first character uppercase and all the other characters as in the original input.
